item.title: AWS User Group Meetup - Scalable Big Data ETL with Spark and AWS StepFunction
item.description:
In this online session, I presented on using EMR Spark to ingest large datasets and orchestrating them with AWS Step Functions. The presentation covered basic Step Functions commands, including branching, parameter parsing, and connecting to Athena.

The session recording is available online here, and the slides can be viewed here.
